AppIntentMessage.title: AppIntentMessage
AppIntentMessage.description: A message sent to a Firebolt app.

PlatformIntentMessage.title: PlatformIntentMessage
PlatformIntentMessage.description: A message sent to the Firebolt platform.

Intent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention.

NavigationIntent.title: NavigationIntent
NavigationIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate to a specific place in an app.

DiscoveryIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to discover something at the aggregate experience level, e.g. content, apps, etc.

DeviceIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to control some aspect of their device.

PlaybackControlIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to control some aspect of in-progress playback.

DialogIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a platform or user intention to converse in a dialog.

LaunchIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to launch an app.
LaunchIntent.title: LaunchIntent

HomeIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to it's home screen, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
HomeIntent.title: HomeIntent

EntityIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to a specific entity page, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
EntityIntent.title: EntityIntent

ChannelIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intent to 'surf' to the next or previous channel.
ChannelIntent.title: ChannelIntent

TuneIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to 'tune' to a traditional over-the-air broadcast, or an OTT Stream from an OTT or vMVPD App.
TuneIntent.title: TuneIntent

options.description: The options property of the data property MUST have only one of the following fields.

assetId.description: The ID of a specific 'listing', as scoped by the target App's ID-space, which the App should begin playback from.

restartCurrentProgram.description: Denotes that the App should start playback at the most recent program boundary, rather than 'live.'

time.description: ISO 8601 Date/Time where the App should begin playback from.

PlaybackIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to a the video player for a specific, playable entity, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
PlaybackIntent.title: PlaybackIntent

SearchIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to it's search UI with a search term populated, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
SearchIntent.title: SearchIntent

SectionIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to a section not covered by `home`, `entity`, `player`, or `search`, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
SectionIntent.title: SectionIntent

PlayEntityIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to a the video player for a specific, playable entity, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
PlayEntityIntent.title: PlayEntityIntent

PlayQueryIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to a the video player for an abstract query to be searched for and played by the app.

ContentDiscoveryIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to discover content with out a clear specific entity match.

EntityAppSelectionIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate to a specific entity that could be served by more than one app.
